A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As far as plot goes\, not a lot happens time wise. Characteristically progression was great though. You get to see the characters grow over the course of the movie. I think this movie represents the passing of the torch from the old generation to the new one. I like this movie. If you want flashy action\, this isnt the movie for you. if you want character progression\, this film is spot on.
